meta.title: Wood Privacy Fence Installation Toledo OH | Affordable & Classic | Ghareeb Fencing
meta.description: Professional wood privacy fence installation in Toledo. Affordable pressure-treated pine fencing with classic appeal. Free quotes.

hero.headline: Wood Privacy Fence Installation
hero.description: Classic wood privacy fencing at an affordable price. Pressure-treated for durability, perfect for homeowners who want privacy without the premium price tag.

intro.headline: Why Choose Wood Fencing?
intro.content: Wood fencing offers timeless appeal at the most budget-friendly price point. Our pressure-treated pine fences provide years of reliable privacy and can be painted or stained to match your home's aesthetic.
intro.content2: Perfect for backyard privacy, pet containment, or property definition on a budget.
benefits: Can be painted or stained any color

styles.headline: Wood Fence Styles We Install
styles.subheadline: Available in 6' and 8' heights. Can be painted or stained.

items.name: Solid Privacy
items.description: Traditional dog-ear pickets for full privacy. Our most popular wood style.

items.name: Shadowbox
items.description: Alternating boards on each side. Good neighbor fence looks great from both sides.

items.name: Privacy with Lattice
items.description: Solid privacy with decorative lattice top accent.

comparison.headline: Wood Fence Options: Good / Better / Best

tiers.name: Good
tiers.subtitle: Economy Privacy
tiers.description: 6ft dog-ear pickets with pressure-treated pine. 4x4 treated posts. Budget-friendly option with 10-15 year lifespan.

tiers.name: Better
tiers.subtitle: Standard Privacy
tiers.description: Premium treated lumber with flat-top or dog-ear style. Metal brackets, concrete-set posts, decorative caps included.

tiers.name: Best
tiers.subtitle: Premium with Lattice
tiers.description: Board-on-board or lattice-top style with select grade lumber. Custom trim options and 6x6 posts available.

cta.headline: Ready for Your Wood Fence?
cta.description: Get a free quote for wood fence installation. Affordable privacy for your backyard.
